item.title: Apache BarCamp Boston, MA 2013
Apache BarCamp Colombo, Sri Lanka
item.description: This will eventually redirect to http://barcamp.org/apache-lk-12 Please redirect yourself via cut-n-paste for now.

item.title: Apache BarCamp Washington, D.C. 2012
Apache Conferences Calendar
item.description: Upcoming Apache events This is the list of upcoming official Apache events, and those events which have been approved to use Apache Marks under the Third Party Event Branding Policy. List loading For a complete list of events see our calendar. In addition to Official Apache Events, there are a wide range of other events which feature Apache projects and technologies. A crowd-source list of these is maintained as a Lanyrd Guide, and we encourage people to help list related events here.

item.title: Apache Conferences Calendar
item.description: This Calendar is maintained by the Apache Conferences Committee (ConCom). It’s used to list official Apache events, and those events which have been approved to use Apache Marks under the Third Party Event Branding Policy. This Calendar is also available as an iCal feed

item.title: Apache Past Events
item.description: Past ApacheCons For details on past ApacheCons, and archived sites of previous events (where available), please see http://archive.apachecon.com/ Information on past ApacheCons is also available on the ApacheCon Wiki

item.title: News - Apache BarCamp Boston
item.description: We’re excited to announce that Registration is now open, please go to our Registration page to sign up right now. Apache BarCamp Boston welcomes our first sponsor, Hippo! There are still additional sponsorship opportunities available too.

item.title: News - Apache BarCamp DC
item.description: We’re excited to announce that Registration is now open, please go to our Registration page to sign up right now. There are still sponsorship opportunities available too.

item.title: Privacy Policy - Apache BarCamp Boston
item.description: Information about your use of this website is collected using server access logs and a tracking cookie. The collected information consists of the following: The IP address from which you access the website; The type of browser and operating system you use to access our site; The date and time you access our site; The pages you visit; and The addresses of pages from where you followed a link to our site.

item.title: Privacy Policy - Apache BarCamp DC
item.description: Information about your use of this website is collected using server access logs and a tracking cookie. The collected information consists of the following: The IP address from which you access the website; The type of browser and operating system you use to access our site; The date and time you access our site; The pages you visit; and The addresses of pages from where you followed a link to our site.

item.title: Registration - Apache BarCamp Boston
item.description: Registration is now open! Please register via the Eventbrite below. Event registrationfor Apache BarCamp Boston powered by Eventbrite Or visit our Eventbrite registration page for details.

item.title: Registration - Apache BarCamp DC
item.description: Registration is now open! If you think you’ll be able to make it to some Post-BarCamp beers, please choose that option, otherwise, choose BarCamp Only. Online Ticketing for Apache BarCamp D.C. 2012powered by Eventbrite Or visit our Eventbrite registration page for details.

Where/When - Apache BarCamp Boston
item.description:
The BarCamp will be held at the Microsoft NERD Center Date: May 19th, 2013 Time: 9am - 6pm EDT Where: 1 Memorial Drive #1 Cambridge, MA 02142
View Larger Map

item.title: Where/When - Apache BarCamp DC
item.description:
The BarCamp will be held at Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC)‘s conference center. Date: May 19th, 2012 Time: 9am - 5pm Where: 1710 SAIC Dr. McLean, Va. 22102
View Larger Map Breakfast, Lunch and Snacks for the day will be provided.
